name: Ascended from darkness version 1.4
description:
Moving Keys is W, A, S, D, shooting is on "K".  To change color on bullets is 1, 2, 3.

"Esc" to get in to pause, and options.

Game is not finished, so we post what we can finish. Hope you like it, and will keep working until is done so follow us, if you want to see this game ended.
